name: New Super Mario Bros. Fingore Fight
name_original: New Super Mario Bros. Fingore Fight
description:
A copy of New Super Mario Bros. with a secret unused enemy... Play as the ghost enemy Scripulous Fingore and bother the protagonist Super Mario while surviving his attacks while he's Mega Mario.

Press Z to poke Mario. Poke him 3 times at the beginning to make him mad. Collect items to stay alive.

Updates will come to Scratch before Itch, because the game is made in Scratch. This also means people playing on Scratch will get a peek at work-in-progress updates. if you'd like to play on Scratch. use the link below:

New Super Mario Bros. Fingore Fight on Scratch (mit.edu)

Happy playing!
